name: Work Notes
desc: Full stack project about Taking Notes
one: User Authentication, Dashboard, Editing Profile of own account
two: User, admin can do CRUD operations based on their individual task
three: Search implementation, filter tasks based on priority and completeness of the task
five: Admin has access to adding products
techs: html, css, Tailwind css, React, Firebase Authentication, ExpressJs, MongoDB, Heroku, React hook form, React Query, Stripe.

name: Homies
desc: Full stack project about Manufacturing Products
one: Different Roles for User & Admin which was implemented with firebase.
two: Applied product buying, payment & dashboard functionality.
three: UI framework, MongoDB used for building the website more interactive.
five: Admin has access to adding products
techs: html, css, Tailwind css, React, Firebase Authentication, ExpressJs, MongoDB, Heroku, React hook form, React Query, Stripe.

name: SS-warehouse
desc: Backend based project depending on warehouse
one: Data loaded from Heroku which was stored in MongoDB.
two: Users can Add, update, delete & Restock items.
three: Simple colors were used to make the website.
techs: html, css, Bootstrap, React, Firebase, ExpressJs, MongoDB, Heroku.

name: Dr-Sarkar
desc: Portfolio for an individual service provider
one: User Interaction of login & signup system implemented with Firebase.
two: Service Items were made based on JSON files.
three: A beautiful UI design with React-Bootstrap.
five: React toastify used, to clicking button more interesting
techs: html, css, Bootstrap, React, Firebase Authentication, React Router.

name: Car Hunter
desc: Reviewing site for Cars. built with React-router.
two: User car reviews section with function of mapping.
three: Blogging section with simple coding question answer.
techs: html, css, bootstrap, React, React Router, React Recharts.

name: Influencer Gear
desc: Influencer product showcase. Gadget based Inflencers to be inspired.
one: Simple project using vanila css and Bootstrap.
